fail.message: Search could not be completed without source data

screenfull.error: Full screen failed, please refresh and try again
screenfull.capture: No content to display in full screen
screenfull.support: The current browser does not support full screen operation

captcha.error: Error {num} times in a row, please try again later
captcha.move: Please move the slider to complete the verification
captcha.drag: Drag the slider on the left to complete the puzzle
captcha.dragging: Drag the slider to flatten the floating image correctly
captcha.success: It took {take} seconds to complete the image stitching verification
captcha.flatten: Drag the slider to flatten the picture

password.tip: Must contain two or more combinations of letters, numbers and special characters
password.size: {min}-{max} characters, case sensitive, no spaces before or after
password.format: Letters, numbers, English and special characters
password.least: Password must be at least {min} characters long
